titles.title: There's A Wideness In God's Mercy

authors.author: Frederick W. Faber Lizzie S. Tourjee

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: There's a wideness in God's mercy newline Like the wideness of the sea; newline There's a kindness in His justice, newline Which is more than liberty.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: There is welcome for the sinner, newline And more graces for the good. newline There is mercy with the Savior; newline There is healing in His blood.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: For the love of God is broader newline Than the measure of man's mind; newline And the heart of the Eternal newline Is most wonderfully kind.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: If our love were but more simple, newline We should take Him at His word; newline And our lives would be all sunshine newline In the sweetness of our Lord.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: There is plentiful redemption newline In the blood that has been shed; newline There is joy for all the members newline In the sorrows of the Head.
